subject: Concurrent Testing with Unique Data
msgSnippet: I ve written code to write forms to a Database, each form must have an individual Id number, which is hard coded in. Junit is perfect for testing this once.
messageBody:
I've written code to write forms to a Database, each form must have an individual
Id number, which is hard coded in. Junit is perfect for testing this once.


However if I wish to use a performance test on this (say a JunitPerf, Load
Test to send multiple forms concurrently) this wont work, as the ID numbers
which need too be unique are all the same, so previously exist in the database,
causing an error.

Is there an aspect of JunitPerf/Junit that allows for multiple test to be
preformed when each individual test involves unique data?

Does anyone know a meethod around this?

Thank you :)
